name: Heal & Hurt
description:
Heal & Hurt

Heal & Hurt is a fast-paced old school arena shooter where you switch sides from angel to skeleton and vice versa every time you die! Pay attention to what damage type you are using as you can either heal or hurt your enemies (and yourself!)

When playing as an angel, you can fly through the skies and take out your opponents from high ground! As a skeleton dive endlessly in waters and pass though the bony walls. Both sides can use teleports to get fast from location to another!

Features
  • Switch sides every time you die
  • Heal or hurt your enemies (and yourself!)
  • 6 different weapons
  • Rocket jumping
  • Teleportation
  • As an angel, fly through the skies
  • As a skeleton, lurk in waters and pass through the bony walls
  • Visuals change depending on your side
